name: UIScrollViewAccessibilityDelegate
desc: A set of methods you can implement to provide accessibility information for a scroll view.

items.name: func accessibilityScrollStatus(for: UIScrollView) -> String?
items.desc: Returns a string describing the content at the current offset in the scroll view.

items.name: func accessibilityAttributedScrollStatus(for: UIScrollView) -> NSAttributedString?
items.desc: Returns an attributed string describing the content at the current offset in the scroll view.
